isis.stitle: TSI 02-12-04 - Improved Air Solenoid Valve for Engine Fan and Radiator Shutters

subjectgroup.subject: Improved Air Solenoid Valve for Engine Fan and Radiator Shutters

geninfo.para: This TSI does NOT apply to 4200, 4300, and 4400 models.

A new long-life remote-mounted 3-way air solenoid valve is available for use with engine on-off fans and radiator shutters. It is designed to be mounted to the cowl (strongly recommended), and can be used to replace engine-mounted solenoids. This kit is designed for International vehicles and includes the solenoid valve as well as harnesses, tubing adapters, fittings, tubing, tie straps and instructions. The 3-way designation means that it can be used in both normally closed and normally open applications.

partsinfo.para: ZBH993249 - Horton Remote Mount Air Solenoid Valve Kit

step1.para: Carefully read and follow the instructions enclosed with the kit.
Note whether your system requires a normally open or normally closed valve and connect the tubing to the appropriate ports on the 3-way valve.
If the fan drive is a front-tether design, there should be no more than a ½" deflection in the airline running from the fan clutch through the shroud.
Operate the vehicle and verify proper fan or shutter operation.
